name: 25 Numbers Speed & Reflex Challenge
description:
Up for a challenge? Tap numbers in order from 1 to 25 in only 10 seconds !
* Puzzles are always unique. Endless possibilities!
* A simple game that will test your speed and accuracy while keeping your mind active!
* Earn achievements, compete with the world! (Game Center)

How to play:
1) Tap the big button to shuffle the numbers.
2) Tap numbers 1 to 25 in order as fast as you can.
3) Score screen will appear after the time runs out or after you have won.
4) Repeat steps 1 through 3 to replay the game!

Good luck and enjoy!
